title: Help! I've been trying to transfer WhatsApp chat histories from an LG G5 to an iPhone 7, but I can't seem to find a free method other than individually emailing each chat history. Can anybody help? - Quora

response.answer_text: Q: How to transfer WhatsApp chat history from an Android phone to an iOS device. A: Unfortunately, it’s not possible with native backup/restore options. For whatever reason, WhatsApp devs decided not to implement backward compatibility and WhatsApp chat db files from Android are not compatible for iOS and vice versa.
